title: Walnut Butter

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Arrange walnuts on a baking tray and toast for 8-10 minutes (180°C).
Place toasted walnuts in mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then grind again <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add avocado oil, salt and honey then mix <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>.
Serve spread onto wedges of fresh apple or onto freshly sliced banana.
